name: Hf-criticalmass
tagline: "HF Critical Mass" software is derived from "Critical Mass", 1971 film by Hollis Frampton. Technically, it is applied to digital videos. Go to the "release" page to download the software.
body: "HF Critical Mass" software is derived from "Critical Mass", 1971 film by Hollis Frampton. Technically, it is applied to digital videos. Go to the "release" page to download the software.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
